text: The Super Quartet is an album led by drummer Louis Hayes which was recorded in Italy in 1994 and released on the Dutch Timeless label.Timeless Records SJP series discography accessed April 18, 2017Louis Hayes catalog accessed April 18, 2017Louis Hayes Leader Entry accessed April 18, 2017Louis Hayes: Music accessed April 18, 2017 == Reception == The Allmusic review called it "easily one of Louis Hayes' best recordings as a leader" stating "This quartet session led by drummer Louis Hayes almost has the flavor of a typical Art Blakey & the Jazz Messengers album; although there's no brass, the selections and the hard bop arrangements generally fit". == Track listing == # "Bolivia" (Cedar Walton) – 6:40 # "The Song Is You" (Jerome Kern, Oscar Hammerstein II) – 6:12 # "Up Jumped Spring" (Freddie Hubbard) – 8:17 # "In Your Own Sweet Way" (Dave Brubeck) – 8:59 # "Chelsea Bridge" (Billy Strayhorn) – 9:41 # "Epistrophy" (Thelonious Monk, Kenny Clarke) – 6:53 # "Blue Lou" (Edgar Sampson, Irving Mills) – 4:56 # "Fee-Fi-Fo-Fum" (Wayne Shorter) – 6:44 == Personnel == *Louis Hayes – drums *Javon Jackson – tenor saxophone *Kirk Lightsey – piano *Essiet Essiet – bass == References == Category:Louis Hayes albums Category:1994 albums Category:Timeless Records albums
title: The Super Quartet
